0111000111010010 0101010101110110 0 -> sum: 1100011101001000, cout: 0

0011001010100100 0100100111100000 1 -> sum: 0111110010000101, cout: 0

1100111000001001 0010111111101001 0 -> sum: 1111110111110010, cout: 0
1110100001101111 0000000010110101 0 -> sum: 1110100100100100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
